title: Implement TCP logging server for device
description: Create a TCP server on the host machine to receive logs from the device over WiFi. This replaces serial monitoring with network-based logging. Server should listen for incoming connections from device (192.168.0.4), receive log messages, and stream them to stdout. Allows remote monitoring without serial cable.
acceptance_criteria: TCP server listens on specified port and accepts device connections
Logs from device are received and displayed in real-time
Output can be saved to file or piped for further processing
